body: I see no evidence that bsseeker2 does not support Python 3. The [system requirements](https://github.com/BSSeeker/BSseeker2#3-system-requirements) say Python 2.6+, and the [bioconda package](https://github.com/bioconda/bioconda-recipes/blob/master/recipes/bs-seeker2/meta.yaml) does not restrict things to Python 2.
title: Allow bsseeker2 to build with Python 3
